de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.Core.Display

Class FxUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Scene
      • de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.Core.Display.FxUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UI, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class FxUI
extends javafx.scene.Scene
implements UI
    The UserInterface for the Graphical display CELL_SIZE defines how big one Entity or Coordinate Field is in px
